name: Laser Command (Alex Kollar)
description:
Development in progress. 

I am pretty much building the game from the ground up thanks to the Udemy Unity 2D Course. Be sure to check it out to make your own version of this game! The community there is awesome and its how I found my "start" in the topic.

How to play:

  • Movement with WASD OR Directional Buttons
  • Shoot with Space. 

As always if you like what you see. Drop a comment and follow me for more games!  You can also come hang out in  our Discord. Be sure to drop in and say Hi!
